summary: Wanda, a lonely housewife, drifts through mining country until she meets a petty thief who takes her in.
cast: Barbara Loden|Michael Higgins|Dorothy Shupenes|Peter Shupenes|Jerome Thier|Marian Thier|Anthony Rotell|M.L. Kennedy|Gerald Grippo|Milton Gittleman|Lila Gittleman|Arnold Kanig|Joe Dennis|Charles Dosinan|Jack Ford|Rozamond Peck|Susan Clark|Linda Clark|Bill Longworth|Frank Jourdano|Valerie Mamches|Pete Richman|Ed Somavitch
title: Wanda
